Downloaded and extracted with WinRAR which resulted in 2 files: IMAGE.000 and IMAGE.DVD files. 

I am using iXtreme 1.3 and this game is NOT capatible with iXtreme until you reinsert the stealth files.  I reinserted the PFI.bin, SS.bin, and DMI.bin files.  I also had to reinsert the video which XDVDMulleter restructured based on my latest inserted PFI file.  

This game will play in regions at NTSC-U and PAL, NO NTSC-J!
